PerfectNetExp.abs: 什么意思_英语defence在线翻译_有道词典... ... defensiveness 防御；防御性 defenselessness 无防御 defend 保卫；防守.
2。英语中有6个元音字母a, e, i, o, u, y(半元音),但defenselessness(无防备)和respectlessness(不尊重)却是最长的只含有一个元音字母的两个单词,那就是.
figuratively ['figjurətivli] ad 比喻的defenselessness n 无防御，无保护defensiveness [di'fensivnis] n 防御，守势

list.abs: and i am so perfectly defenseless ., 和我很完美手无寸铁.
People think it a serious crime to attack defenseless children ., 人们认为攻击手无寸铁的儿童是一种严重的罪行.
The bandits descended on the defenseless village ., 匪徒突袭无防御的村庄.
I love defenseless animals , especially in a good soup ., 我热爱没有攻击性的动物 , 特别是在浓香的汤里.

means.word_mean: 1. the property of being helpless in the face of attack

auth_sentence.content: Their defenselessness has something Kafkaesque about it.
